EmailTemplate.description: SHP Grievance Email Notification when SR Changed to NonExempt
EmailTemplate.name: SHP Grievance Email Notification when SR Changed to NonExempt
EmailTemplate.subject: Grievance Ticket Number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Exempt Grievance service request number {!Case.CaseNumber} has been changed to Non-Exempt. Please take action on this request.
Thank you!
